lines.text: If I paid you to think, you could cash your check at the penny arcade.
Where do you think I cash it now?
Lionel, you'd better go to your room. I don't want you to get hit by your father.
Because I'm not sure just where I'm going to throw him!
How come we overcame and nobody told me?
I don't have to stay here and be insulted!
That's right Mother Jefferson, YOU CAN GO ANYWHERE & BE INSULTED!
This here is the living area, where we does our living, and this is the dining area, where we does our dining, and this is the kitchen area...
She's what you call, a domestic.
You make it sound like a disease!

[to George]
Your nose is so high you need a 10 foot pole to pick it!
